scripts.start:prod: sh -c "if [ -z \"$DATABASE_URL\" ]; then echo '‚ùå ERROR: DATABASE_URL is not set!' && echo 'Please set DATABASE_URL environment variable in Render Dashboard' && exit 1; fi && MASKED_URL=$(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed 's/:[^:@]*@/:****@/') && echo 'üìù DATABASE_URL is set: $MASKED_URL' && HOST=$(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed -n 's/.*@\([^:]*\).*/\1/p') && if [ -n \"$HOST\" ] && echo \"$HOST\" | grep -qE '^(localhost|127\.0\.0\.1)$'; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: DATABASE_URL host is localhost or 127.0.0.1!' && echo 'This will not work in production. Please use Render PostgreSQL database URL.' && echo 'Go to Render Dashboard ‚Üí Your PostgreSQL Service ‚Üí Copy Internal Database URL' && exit 1; fi && echo 'üîß Generating Prisma Client...' && npx prisma generate && echo 'üì¶ Running database migrations...' && npx prisma migrate deploy && echo 'üöÄ Starting application...' && node dist/main"
